title: Pregnant Lydia Bright reveals she's felt her daughter kick for the first time
text:
She's enjoying a 'bestie babymoon' with her close friend Lucy Meckleburgh as they both eagerly await the arrival of their first child.

And pregnant Lydia Bright revealed their girls' trip to Corfu has already been memorable because she felt her baby daughter kick for the first time on Thursday.

The former TOWIE star, 29, posted a series of sweet snaps to her Instagram page and told her followers her 'bump has just popped'.

Glowing: Pregnant Lydia Bright revealed her girls' trip to Corfu has already been memorable because she felt her baby daughter kick for the first time on Thursday

She wrote: 'All aboard the princess with my little princess. Who kicked for the first time last night in bed, such a special moment.

'My bump has just popped this trip, it’s all signs that she is growing and is nearly ready to meet the world.'

Lydia showed off her pregnancy glow in a series of glamorous snaps from the girls' holiday to Corfu.

When announcing she'd felt her unborn daughter kick for the first time, the TV personality looked glam in a long white dress covered in a sea-inspired print.

Eating for two! The former TOWIE star, 29, posted a series of sweet snaps to her Instagram page and told her followers her 'bump has just popped'

The blonde beauty contained the theme with starfish shaped earrings, a white hat and pair of sunglasses.

Another photograph showed the mother-to-be enjoying a spot of breakfast while putting on a busty display in a white swimsuit.

Lydia looked sensational as she posed fresh-faced next to a plate of fruit and pastries with her shoulder-length hair curled.

The mother-to-be is joined on the trip by pregnant Lucy Mecklenburgh, 28, and the pair are due to give birth just five days apart from each other.

Bumping along: Lydia is enjoying a 'bestie babymoon' with her close friend and former TOWIE co-star Lucy Mecklenburgh, 28, who is also expecting her first child

On Thursday, the pregnant duo posed in matching leopard print swimwear while larking around on a boat.

Lucy and Lydia were proudly displaying their bumps during the fun-filled journey, where former Made In Chelsea star Ashley James, 32, was acting as photographer for the ladies.

Lydia recently revealed to Closer magazine that she is planning for Lucy's little boy to marry her daughter - although she mused that they may wind up more like cousins.

Earlier this month, Lucy shared a video of the moment she and her fiancé, former Coronation Street star Ryan Thomas, 35, discovered the sex of the baby.

Miaow! Lydia and Lucy celebrated their matching pregnancies with matching swimwear as they headed out on a boat for the day in Corfu

Stunning: The duo looked happy and relaxed as they larked around on a boat

Lucy took to Instagram on the evening of her 28th birthday in August to announce she is expecting her first child with Ryan.

The ex Corrie star gifted Lucy a baby grow, which they held up for the snap as they revealed that they are set to welcome their first baby together, two months after he proposed during a romantic trip to Italy, following two years of dating.

Alongside the heartwarming shot, the reality star wrote: 'Best birthday present 'I've ever had. Love you @ryanthomas84,' with a baby emoji and a heart emoji included in the caption.

Ryan also raises daughter Scarlett with his ex-girlfriend and former Coronation Street co-star Tina O'Brien, 36, who he was in a relationship with for six years.

Lydia announced in August that she was expecting her first child, a daughter, with her ex-boyfriend Lee Cronin in February next year.

While Lydia is pleased to become a first-time mother, the star confirmed she split from her long-term partner Lee after being in a relationship for more than two years.

The couple first briefly parted ways in January with Lydia confirming they had split for good in August.
description: The former TOWIE star, 29, revealed their girls' trip to Corfu has already been memorable because she felt her baby daughter kick for the first time on Thursday.
